content: and yes, at very low (and insecure) validation numbers, crosslinking could be very slow

author: jgm
content:
<@!534934855113506836> ethdo uses the EIP-2335 format for keystores, and has some additional pieces such as EIP-2386.  It would be great if chainsafe wanted to work to the same standards, as it would allow wallets to be shared between codebases.  Happy to help out with info wherever required.

(Note that as per the info at the end of the discussion on 2386 it will undergo some changes in the next few days, along with an additional EIP that covers details of on-disk layouts)
